structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Cost of transporting or exhuming a body.
law.text: In the event it is necessary for the coroner to order a body to be transported or exhumed, payment shall be made by the fiscal court, consolidated local government, or urban-county government, whichever is appropriate, upon certification by the coroner that the services were rendered.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 73, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 11, effective June 17, 1978.
